articles.description: As Virgil van Dijk prepares to lift his second Premier League title with Liverpool, we look at how the 33-year-old centre-back learned from early setbacks to become one of the best in the world.

articles.title: When can Liverpool win the 2024-25 Premier League title?

articles.description: Marcus Rashford feels it is unlikely he will play for Manchester United again under Ruben Amorim, but will not rush a decision on his future.
